alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 7:26PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, western Camden, eastern Brantley and eastern Charlton Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 726 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Nahunta to near St. George. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hilliard, Folkston, Callahan, Nahunta, Homeland, Hickox, Kings Ferry, St. George, Raybon and Atkinson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brantley; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Western Charlton
